languages.text: "Да все, кто ему на пути попался, Ваша Светлость... офицеры, серфы... один техномат... Он даже на сервитора одного накинулся — правда, отстал быстро, просто оторвал ему голову и все. Остальных, тварь ксеносская, мучил до тех пор, пока всю душу не вытрясал". {n}Офицер бледнеет на глазах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да все, кто ему на пути попался, Ваша Светлость... офицеры, серфы... один техномат... Он даже на сервитора одного накинулся — правда, отстал быстро, просто оторвал ему голову и все. Остальных, тварь ксеносская, мучил до тех пор, пока всю душу не вытрясет". {n}Офицер бледнеет на глазах.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да все, кто ему на пути попался, Ваша Светлость... офицеры, серфы... один техномат... Он даже на сервитора одного накинулся — правда, отстал быстро, просто оторвал ему голову и все. Остальных, тварь ксеносская, мучил до тех пор, пока всю душу не вытрясал". {n}Офицер бледнеет на глазах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scumbag tortured them to all the hells." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

traits.locale_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... The rest of them, though... the xenos scumbag tortured them to all the hells." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured them to all the hells." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: « Tous ceux qui ont eu le malheur de se trouver sur son chemin, Votre Seigneurie. Des officiers, des serfs... un technomate... Il s'est même attaqué à un servitor, même si ce fut bref ; il s'est contenté de lui arracher la tête. Les autres n'ont pas eu cette chance... Cette vermine xénos les a torturés avec un sadisme hors du commun. » {n}Vous voyez le visage de l'officier pâlir à vue d'œil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tous ceux qui ont eu le malheur de se trouver sur son chemin, Votre Seigneurie. Officiers, serfs... un technomate... Il s'est même attaqué à un servitor, même si ce fut bref ; il s'est contenté de lui arracher la tête. Les autres n'ont pas eu cette chance... Cette vermine xénos les a torturés avec un sadisme hors du commun. » {n}Vous voyez le visage de l'officier pâlir à vue d'œil.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: 「手当たり次第です、陛下…士官、農奴…テクノマット…サーヴィターさえも攻撃したのです。頭を切り捨てられ、長くは保ちませんでした。残りの者たちは…異種族のクソどもが、死ぬまで拷問し続けていました」{n}士官の顔から血の気が引いていくのが見て取れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「手当たり次第です、陛下…士官、農奴…テクノマット…サーヴィターさえも攻撃したのです。頭を切り捨てられ、長くは保ちませんでした。残りの者たちは…異種族のクソどもが、死ぬまで拷問し続けていました」{n}士官の顔から血の気が引いていくのが見て取れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: “凡是他能碰到的人，全都被他杀了，大人……无论是军官、仆役，还是技工……他甚至还袭击了一个机仆，不过没过多久，他就把机仆的脑袋扯下来了。剩下的人……都被那个该死的异形折磨得生不如死。”{n}你看到这位军官脸上的血色正在慢慢消失。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “凡是他能碰到的人，全都被他杀了，大人……无论是军官、仆役，还是技工……他甚至还袭击了一个奴工，不过没过多久，他就把奴工的脑袋扯下来了。剩下的人……都被那个该死的异形折磨得生不如死。”{n}你看到这位军官脸上的血色正在慢慢消失。{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Jeden, den er in die Finger bekommen konnte, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Offiziere, Sklaven ... einen Technomaten ... Er hat sogar einen Servitoren attackiert, doch das hat nicht lange gedauert. Er hat ihm einfach den Kopf abgerissen. Aber die anderen ... der Xenos-Abschaum hat das Leben aus ihnen herausgefoltert." {n}Du siehst, wie dem Offizier die Farbe aus dem Gesicht weicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jeden, den er in die Finger bekommen konnte, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Offiziere, Sklaven ... einen Technomaten ... Er hat sogar einen Servitoren attackiert, doch das hat nicht lange gedauert. Er hat ihm einfach den Kopf abgerissen. Aber die anderen ... der Xenos-Abschaum hat sie bis in alle Höllen gefoltert." {n}Du siehst, wie dem Offizier die Farbe aus dem Gesicht weicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: «Todo el que cayó en sus garras, mi{mf|lord|lady}... oficiales, siervos... un tecnómata... Incluso atacó a un servidor, aunque no le duró mucho porque se limitó a arrancarle la cabeza. Los demás, sin embargo... la escoria xenos los torturó a todos hasta la muerte». {n}El rostro del oficial palidece visiblemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Todo el que cayó en sus garras, mi{mf|lord|lady}... oficiales, siervos... un tecnómata... Incluso atacó a un servidor, aunque no le duró mucho porque se limitó a arrancarle la cabeza. Los demás, sin embargo... la escoria xenos los torturó a todos con saña». {n}El rostro del oficial palidece visiblemente.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Eline kimi geçirebildiyse onlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Subaylar, köleler... Bir teknomat. Bir hizmetöre bile saldırdı. O fazla dayanamadı, kellesini uçuruverdi. Diğerleri ise... Zeno pisliği öldürünceye dek onlara işkence etti." {n}Subayın betinin benzinin attığını görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anyone he could get his hands on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Officers, serfs... a technomat... He even attacked a servitor, although that didn't last long, he just tore its head off. The rest of them, though... the xenos scum tortured the life out of them." {n}You can see the colour draining from the officer's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eline kimi geçirebildiyse {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Subaylar, köleler... Bir teknomat. Bir hizmetöre bile saldırdı. Hoş, o fazla dayanamadı, kellesini uçuruverdi. Diğerleri ise... Zeno pisliği onlara ölene kadar işkence etti." {n}Subayın betinin benzinin attığını görebiliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow
